thread.section_title: Better Music Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Better Music | bettermusic.com.au
thread.title: Keith Ham
thread.title_full: Better Music reviewed by Keith Ham

author: Keith Ham
title: Keith Ham
text: BetterMusic were great to deal with from start to finish. After perusing their excellent website and ordering my choice I had a change of mind, and decided on a different keyboard - same price. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff at BetterMusic, and my order was changed without fuss, and delivered to my door a couple of days later in great condition. Very happy with our new Casio AP460 Digital Piano, and would recommend BetterMusic to anyone looking for musical instruments.
